snippet: If Peyton Manning proves to be healthy, should the Colts trade him, trade the No. 1 pick or team him with Andrew Luck for a year or two?
abstract: If Peyton Manning proves to be healthy, should the Colts trade him, trade the No. 1 pick or team him with Andrew Luck for a year or two?
lead_paragraph: It was the biggest news of Black Monday. Bill Polian was out. He and Bill Belichick, brilliant and difficult men, had matched personnel wits for over a decade, and Colts-Patriots meetings had turned into signature games of an era.

headline.main: Polians Fired; What Should Colts Do Next?
